pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyRCL## Release Notes### v1.0.9* Fixed error related functions to not use dbg.fnc(), otherwise the error state is reset. Affected functions: * def error_address(self) -> Address: (dropped) * def error_cmdline(self) -> str: * def error_fileline(self) -> int: (dropped) * def error_filename(self) -> str: (dropped) * def error_firstid(self) -> str: * def error_id(self) -> str: * def error_message(self) -> str: * def error_occurred(self) -> bool: * def error_position(self) -> int: (dropped)### v1.0.8* Fixed missing breakpoint actions `WATCH`, `TRACEENABLE`, `TRACEDATA`, `TRACEON`, `TRACEOFF` and `TRACETRIGGER`### v1.0.7* Fixed missing module level export of `hexversion()`### v1.0.6* Fixed missing module level exports of `version` and multiple exceptions* Fixed breakpoint core and size parameters* Added `ConnectionError` as baseclass of `ApiConnectionError`### v1.0.5Various bugfixes### v1.0.4Various bugfixes### v1.0.3Various bugfixes### v1.0.2Various bugfixes### v1.0.1Various bugfixes### v1.0.0Initial release
